feed.title: Sky Cloud Backup
feed.subtitle: A Minecraft Backup that supports both Bedrock and Java.

entry.title: Alpha 03
entry.content:
Alpha 0.3 update

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed the Antivirus software especially Windows defender flags it as a Win32/Persistence.OR!ml
  • Fixed the Home Screen not Centered.

Features

  • Added Thank you when the app is first shown
  • Updated Help with pictures
  • Added About Screen
  • Updated Error Dialogs
  • Updated Backuping You're World Dialog dark mode by default
  • Check and guess what type of edition is your world is (BETA)

entry.title: Alpha 0.2
entry.content:
Alpha 0.2 update

As of Alpha 0.2, the Antivirus software especially Windows defender flags it as a Win32/Persistence.OR!ml this is not true.

Bug Fixes

  • Fix Java world doesn’t recognize when Java mode Backup is on.
  • Fix renaming every backup extension to .zip(if is java) or .mcworld(if is Bedrock).

Added Features

  • A “You’re world is backuping” dialog will appear when you Backup you’re world(Bedrock and Java)
  • You can now start the app with windows
  • Ui changes

entry.title: Alpha 0.1
entry.content:
Welcome to Sky Cloud Backup Alpha 0.1

Added:
  • Main Backup for Bedrock and java
  • Personalization
  • Always on top ans
  • minimize when the app is closed
entry.summary: Welcome to Sky Cloud Backup Alpha 0.1 Added:
